post:
Good Morning Lowendtalk,

Posting this offer here to kick off the new node in a new UK location.

This offer is out of Rapidswitch Maidenhead UK.

<li>4 x vCPU Cores 
<li>384 MB Ram
<li>20 GB Raid 10 HDD
<li>850 GB Transfer @ 1 gbit
<li>1 x IP4
<li>5 x IP6 (assignment due today so possible 24 hours delay for customer use)
 
£3.90 p/month ($5.86 - source xe.com)
COUPON CODE: LEB384FEB

Order Link: https://www.necs.co.uk/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=18



**Company Information**

Registered 2005
Company Number: 5504556
VAT Number: 927207819

ToS: http://www.necs.co.uk/terms-and-conditions/
Virtualisation: KVM
Control Panel: SolusVM
Refund Policy: 7 Days
Domain: necs.co.uk Registered 29-Apr-2004 - Public Whois

Support available by email/whmcs/phone

**Test IP**

Datacenter: RapidSwitch (uk)
Test IPv4: http://95.154.217.3/100mb.bin
Test IPv6: available within 24 hours.

**OTHER**
- DirectAdmin Licence - £4.99pm
- UK Based Servers – Never Oversold
- Payments: PayPal | **Google Checkout **
- VAT @ 20% applies to EU Customers only.

**OFFER NOTES:**
- This is available for new orders only current customers cannot move on to this package however current customers can order it as an additional package if you want to do that.

While windows if offered free please note that attempting to install windows on limited RAM may cause your VPS to blue screen, so is not suitable for anything under 768MB for 2008 Standard edition

HUGE selection of Linux ISO's and auto install templates plus option to upload custom ISO’s and Custom Plans
